about.title: Welcome to Mercuryou
about.mission: Current astrology sites are outdated and just ugly. Mercuryou aims to fill this gap by providing high-quality content, intuitive navigation, and a stylish design.
about.roadmap: Our roadmap includes accessible astrology information, user profile creation, and synastry capabilities in version 1.
about.whoami: This is a work-in-progress <github>side project</github> of mine. If you like it, feel free to reach out on <linkedin>LinkedIn</linkedin>.

create.helper: Select a date and city to draw a chart
create.title: Create Astral Chart
